_comment: Challenge Paths - Special prestige options that modify gameplay
_usage: Activate with !admin challenge <pathname>, players can then !quest prestige challenge at level 20

hard_mode.name: Hard Mode
hard_mode.description: Lower XP gain, lower win chance, bonus to energy if you make it!
special_rules: Gain 50% less XP from all sources

ironman_challenge.name: Path of the Ironman
ironman_challenge.description: Complete prestige 20 without using a single medkit

doctor.name: Doctor
doctor.description: Heal all injuries for all players in the channel
doctor.announcement: {user} channels healing energy! All injuries in the channel have been healed!

bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
bloodlust.description: Grant +20% win chance to all players for the next hour
bloodlust.announcement: {user} unleashes a battle cry! All players gain +20% win chance for 1 hour!

rally.name: Rally
rally.announcement: {user} rallies the troops! All players restore 5 energy!
